       Notes: We noticed, that the game doesn't save properly on systems whose

       The reason behind this is, that the developers chose to name
       their save path: AppDataRoamingMilestoneSÃ©bastien Loeb Rally EVO

       fixes their code officially. You just need this if you live in the
       above mentioned countries and are affected.
